mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, content, nickname, create_dt, update_dt, boardOption, view, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY create_dt DESC) AS rownum FROM board WHERE status = 'N' ORDER BY create_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, nickname, content, create_dt, user_seq, boardOption) VALUES (#{title}, #{nickname}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIME(), #{user_seq}, #{boardOption})
mapper.update: update board set view = view+1 where seq = #{seq}
